results.title: Dick Muffin special agent
results.creator_credit: Jan Bussell, Parthian Production and Peak Films
results.brief_description: Muffin with his thinking cap. Muffin as sleuth wearing black hat and moustache. A dog comes in and complains that he has lost a bone. Song about the “Old Dry Bone”. Muffin in disguise as a girl with pigtails. Penguin comes and he has lost his stopwatch. Muffin the detective, disguised as a Chinese.

results.title: Diary of a male whore
results.brief_description: Wael’s powerful, uncompromising short turns the body of its protagonist into a war zone, playing out the ongoing Israeli-Palestinian conflict. Loosely based on Moroccan author Mohamed Choukri’s For bread alone, a young Palestinian prostitute recalls his at times violent sexual awakening. As this all takes place during an encounter with an Israeli male client, Diary of a male whore also highlights the fraught state of the Israeli-Palestinian ‘peace’ process.

results.title: Diamonds
results.creator_credit: Guild House Films and De Beers Consolidated Mining
results.brief_description: Millions of tons of gravel and sand are sifted and washed in the search for diamonds in South Africa. In London the diamonds are cleaned and sorted according to size, shape, color and clarity. Most are used in industry but the finest are kept for jewellery. This age old craft of designing and making jewellery is shown as a delicate and unique work of art.

results.title: Dial history
results.material_description: Single channel moving image, colour and black and white and audio
results.brief_description: In the found footage tradition, ‘Dial H-I-S-T-O-R-Y’ takes the viewer on a journey through media footage of airplane hijacking and other terrorism.

results.title: Diagnosis of speech and reading problems
results.brief_description: This film demonstrates various tests that the teacher can use to evaluate a student’s neurological development. These include visual pursuit, cortical dominance, cross-pattern creeping, and similar procedures. Slow-motion scenes and freeze frames enhance the value of this training film. (Teacher education)

results.title: Diabetes: not so sweet!
results.creator_credit: Gary Cuttris, Geoff Owen-Taylor and Australian Diabetes Foundation
results.brief_description: A comprehensive look at diabetes. In particular, a look at symptoms, causes, complications, care skills and diet. A number of specialists are interviewed regarding research. Various case studies are also shown.

results.title: Devotion
results.creator_credit: Mindy Kaplan, Arlene Battishill, Northern Arts and Dancing Arrow Productions
results.brief_description: Lesbian and stand-up comic Sheila Caston is about to get her big break - her own TV show. But when it turns out her (unrequited) first love is a central player in the deal, Shelia is thrown into a struggle between past and present; between her unresolved love for TV producer Lynn, and for her partner of five years, Julie. In this emotional maelstrom, personal and professional lives slip into confusion and chaos, throwing Shelia’s career into jeopardy. A love triangle with a 90s twist this film runs the gamut of laughter and tears, joy and sorrow, hope and desperation.
